edu.ucla.sspace.text

Class FileListTemporalDocumentIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.text.FileListTemporalDocumentIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<TemporalDocument>

    public class FileListTemporalDocumentIterator
extends Object
implements Iterator<TemporalDocument>
    An iterator implementation that returns TemporalDocument instances given a file that contains list of files and their creation time stamps, each on a separate line. Any files without time stamps have their last modified time used as their creation time.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileListTemporalDocumentIterator(String fileListName)
      Creates an Iterator over the files listed in the provided file.
